item.description:
Meetup Schedule
7:00pm-9:30pm

Have been hungry for treatments that are actually curing your condition? Have been wondering when and if you should acquire tools that can naturally lift you fear, depression, anxiety and worries? The time is now!

The time bomb has exploded and the science is out with the final verdict!

Read the Newsweek cover story on The Depressing News about Antidepressants by Sharon Begley http://www.newsweek.c....

And then right away
Join us for the next meetup to discover and learn EDR and other self-help tools and techniques that can:

* help your emotions in an enduring way
* create an actual and lasting change in brain chemistry
* do it without unpleasant side-effects and without torturous withdrawal symptoms.
* create states of well-being through authentic energetic alignment and embodiment.

You know the story. You may have considered help from medications to alleviate you depression or anxiety. You, or someone you know, may have tried and accumulated a medicine chest's worth of antidepressants, or anti-anxiety drugs, but none really helped in any enduring way. Then when the side effects became so unpleasant, you may have tried to stop taking them. Only to experience that the withdrawal symptoms (cramps, dizziness, headaches) were torture.

Well you are not alone. Well, here’s why:

Yes, the drugs can be effective in that they lift depression in up to two thirds of patients. But that benefit is hardly more than what patients get when they, unknowingly and as part of a study, take a dummy pill—a placebo. As more and more scientists who study depression and the drugs that treat it are concluding, that suggests that antidepressants are basically expensive Tic Tacs.

The truth is finally out! For most people, the effect does not come from any clinical change in brain chemistry, but from the numbing effects of the drugs.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Fear and anxiety are in the way of doing many things in our life and it isn’t a pleasant experience for anyone. Yuliya Cohen has taken the mystery out of this condition and humanized its complexity. Finally those who are suffering from this disorder are empowered!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: Enter the Gates to Wholeness. EDR - Not a Placebo and No Side Effects!
